title: E-sports clothes
body: Hey guys sorry if this is in English, I know it is the german forum but I am here for a few days and dont speak German properly. I would like to know if some of you know  stores, where I can purchase E-sports clothes in Berlin. For example FNATIC jerseys or jacket, I know i can find these product on internet, but I would like a real place where to buy them. Thank's in advance and sorry for the inconvenience.

replies.body: Only time I saw them for purchase "irl" was at Gamescom, dont think you will have luck finding a shop here :-/
I don't think that there is something like an "Esports Shop" in Germany. These products aren't available here. I think you can only buy them online.
